name: Outlook
description: Access your school email and calendar.

name: ClassCharts
description: Track attendance, behaviour and homework in one place.

name: EduCake
description: Login using the 'Sign in with Microsoft' button. This means you'll be able to sign in using your school email address and normal password.

name: Language Gym
description: School email address and seperate password. If you've forgotten your password please try the 'Forgot your password?' option or visit the ICT Support Office.

name: Sparx Maths
description: Login using the 'Sign in with Microsoft' button. This means you'll be able to sign in using your school email address and normal password.

name: Portico
description: Access your school documents stored on your N: Drive.

name: Microsoft Word
description: Create or Open a Word Document.

name: Microsoft Excel
description: Create or Open an Excel Spreadsheet.

name: Microsoft PowerPoint
description: Create or Open a PowerPoint Presentation.
